formattedAddress: 140 Riverside Blvd, New York, NY 10069, USA
adrFormatAddress: 140 Riverside Blvd, New York, NY 10069, USA

originalText.text: There is no washing machine or dryer in studio apartments, so you have to go down to the basement. If you disappear for 1-2 hours, your laundry will be lost or you may find your laundry in the trash by the employeesAdditionally, when you complain, you will not be able to find a management company that will cover the damage to your lost or found laundry, and no one will pay for your damage.

text.text: There is no washing machine or dryer in studio apartments, so you have to go down to the basement. If you disappear for 1-2 hours, your laundry will be lost or you may find your laundry in the trash by the employeesAdditionally, when you complain, you will not be able to find a management company that will cover the damage to your lost or found laundry, and no one will pay for your damage.

originalText.text:
It really takes me a while to write this comment about the building I live in, but there are unethical facts that everyone should know.This is my 2nd year in this building and I decided to make changes in the buildingI reported this situation to the management and they pretended to help me at first.When they saw that I was eager to move, they contacted a guy named Timothy G.For this person, I have to tell you that he is an opportunistic, greedy broker or company employee who plays bad cop.When the application was passed to Timothy G, he offered me a price opposite to the street easy listing and tried to get me to accept it.Based on my 10 years of investor experience in the real estate industry, I did not agree with this cheap sales policy.
As a listing, you can see the ad on Street Easy for 2 months free rent, but when it comes to the negotiation stage, they make you accept the same price for 1 month free In addition, when such a listing is placed, the choice of payment belongs to the tenantWhat I mean is that they falsely attract potential tenants and show their real faces in a disgusting way during the agreement/signing.
These types of sales policies are very common with greedy management and landlords and are also ugly in the 140-160 riverside blvd apartments You can see what I want to say in the attached pictures.

originalText.text: A really great place to live. Amazing views of the river. Nice, modern apartments. A workable gym. Laundry and pet services. Fun and friendly concierge staff. Being across the street from the park is perfect for us and our dogs.

text.text: A really great place to live. Amazing views of the river. Nice, modern apartments. A workable gym. Laundry and pet services. Fun and friendly concierge staff. Being across the street from the park is perfect for us and our dogs.

originalText.text: A&E is a horrible management company do yourself a favor stay away. Elevators not working on a regular bases. Jennifer Community mgr so not helpful. Water, heat AC issues on going building wide. Rent somewhere else where you will be treated better and get better service.

text.text: A&E is a horrible management company do yourself a favor stay away. Elevators not working on a regular bases. Jennifer Community mgr so not helpful. Water, heat AC issues on going building wide. Rent somewhere else where you will be treated better and get better service.

originalText.text: we just moved in - excellent experience so far. Staff is great as are the amenities. The few checklist items upon move in were taken care of or are in the process . Windows are very good at keeping the noise but the blinds are not good at keeping the sun out.
